Arya Stark : A girl is Arya Stark of Winterfell and she's going home !
Jaqen H'ghar :*bows respectfully* It takes a great deal...
body:
Arya Stark : A girl is Arya Stark of Winterfell and she's going home !
Jaqen H'ghar :*bows respectfully* It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to your enemies, but a great deal more to stand up to your friends.

blog.name: ao3feed-jonrya
blog.title: AO3feed-Jonrya
blog.description: An automated feed for Jon x Arya fics posted on AO3.

title: Death and The Maiden
description:
by LadyBee

His face was handsome and yet ordinary enough to pass by in a crowd without being noticed. Dark wavy hair that reminded her of a fallen angel; a strong jawline; pale face and eyes as gray as the sky that announces the rain. Nothing in him said “danger” and yet, just like the devil himself, Death wasn’t always meant to be ugly and terrifying. No…Sometimes Death could be the most desirable and wonderful thing.
“You are not what I expected.” Arya confessed.
“I’m sure you were ready to see a dreadful monster, but I do enjoy surprising you from time to time.”

Words: 4458, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: A Song of Ice and Fire - George R. R. Martin
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings, No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Jon Snow, Arya Stark, Eddard Stark, Catelyn Tully Stark
  • Relationships: Jon Snow/Arya Stark, Jon Snow & Arya Stark
  • Additional Tags: Halloween Challenge, Halloween, Morbid, Alternate Universe - Horror, Spooky, Death, Supernatural Elements, Ghosts, Witches, Not a Love Story

tags: this post is a 10000 years old
im just trying to do some housekeeping
love that arya knows better than to say ''theyre not my brothers''
but jon just has zero control at that point lol
the first quotes are after they get into fights too
summary:
BEFORE 

"They're not my brothers," Jon snapped. (AGOT)   

They're not my brothers, Arya thought as she bent to yank up her...
body:
BEFORE

“They’re not my brothers,” Jon snapped. (AGOT) 

They’re not my brothers, Arya thought as she bent to yank up her breeches, but she knew better than to say so. (ACOK) 

AFTER

The grey walls of Winterfell might still haunt his dreams, but Castle Black was his life now, and his brothers were Sam and Grenn and Halder and Pyp and the other cast-outs who wore the black of the Night’s Watch. (Jon, AGOT) 

They were her pack, her friends, the only living friends that remained to her, and if not for her they would still be safe at Harrenhal, Gendry sweating at his forge and Hot Pie in the kitchens. (Arya, ASOS)

blog.name: princessaryathevaliant
blog.title: Princess Arya the Valiant
blog.description: A devoted fan defending her precious cinnamon roll, its all you need to know!...and i love cheesecake...bye. Currently on hiatus.

summary: I dont get the whole slytherin arya thing. Where is the ambition? (she literally has so goals in life but to be allowed to be...
body: I dont get the whole slytherin arya thing. Where is the ambition? (she literally has so goals in life but to be allowed to be herself and survive), where is the self preservation (she went back to gendry, some boy she just met couple of weeks ago, from the freaking Mountain; she slowed herself down and risked her own life multiple times just because she didnt want to leave her friends behind. Despite her amazing survival skills, her emotions and her need to protect others have been her main motivations behind her actions.) yes, arya does share a lot of other slytherin qualities such as resourcefulness, leadership but trumps the main ones so hard, that her being in that house makes no sense to me.

reblog.comment: I dont get the whole slytherin arya thing. Where is the ambition? (she literally has so goals in life but to be allowed to be herself and survive), where is the self preservation (she went back to gendry, some boy she just met couple of weeks ago, from the freaking Mountain; she slowed herself down and risked her own life multiple times just because she didnt want to leave her friends behind. Despite her amazing survival skills, her emotions and her need to protect others have been her main motivations behind her actions.) yes, arya does share a lot of other slytherin qualities such as resourcefulness, leadership but trumps the main ones so hard, that her being in that house makes no sense to me.

(she literally has so goals in life but to be allowed to be herself and survive), where is the self preservation (she went back to gendry, some boy she just met couple of weeks ago, from the freaking Mountain; she slowed herself down and risked her own life multiple times just because she didnt want to leave her friends behind. Despite her amazing survival skills, her emotions and her need to protect others have been her main motivations behind her actions.) yes, arya does share a lot of other slytherin qualities such as resourcefulness, leadership but trumps the main ones so hard, that her being in that house makes no sense to me.

blog.name: first-of-her-nxme
blog.title: I see you, wolf child. Blood child

summary: how Jaqen loves Arya if he is just a face
question: how Jaqen loves Arya if he is just a face
answer:
Book spoilers

The theory that Jaqen is just a face comes from the same source that claims that the Faceless Men work for Euron, that Daenerys is the mad queen and Sansa will sit the iron throne. In other words there is little in the books to support it but people will make all sorts of theories because waiting for the books is exhausting. George Martin explains how Jaqen came up with his Lorathi persona in A Dance with Dragons :

The best lies are seasoned with a bit of truth.

This young man Arya meets in A Clash of Kings is a real person and what Arya sees is his real face. His Valyrian name is fake but says a lot about his origins. His Lorathi backstory is fake and his accent even faker - he can’t even stick to the accent, he slips back and forth between common tongue and Lorathi pattern of speech. He smiles all the time - he has a lot of fun making up his false identity and even more fun when people buy his lies. Does it sound familiar ? That’s what Tyrion and Sarella Sand are doing. That’s what the Kindly Man and Arya do when they create Cat of the Canals.

If you haven’t read the books yet think about the show. Both, Jaqen and the Waif, have their own faces and their own unique personalities. Arya was declared no one but she still has her own very human face and her very own Stark personality.   

In the books Jaqen doesn’t love Arya in a romantic way because she is a child. Unlike Gendry he is not jealous of her. He is very tender towards her and he likes her even at her worst. When she names him he’s angry but he calms down quickly and her ungrateful behavior earns her a couple of fond if sarcastic pet names :

evil child, sweet girl, kind and gentle

There are romantic undertones in their relationship but you never get the impression that Jaqen’s feelings are improper or creepy. On the contrary he’s very sweet and chivalrous unlike Arya who openly stares at him and wouldn’t leave the baths until he shoos her out. Arya thinks he smells good ( ginger and cloves ), she notes how it feels to be touched by him - his hands are warm and smooth but solid like a stone. George Martin builds foundation to their you will marry a king reunion.

I don’t dare to predict what might happen in the show because they cut the whole Jaqen storyline the moment they gave him the Kindly Man part. It’s not adaptation at the moment, it’s fanfiction. However even in this version he still has his own, human face and a soft spot for Arya.

Thank you for the ask :)

*Arya and Sansa fighting*

*Arya and Sansa fighting*

*Sansa punches Arya, both freeze in absolute shock*
